version_description:
Hey Heroes! This update brings about balancing tweaks and a few other goodies!

* Some relics are more powerful as a result of this change
* Mercenaries have local notifications when they complete a quest or die
* Displays a tab notification when a mercenary completes a quest or dies
* Players can move all gilds to a hero on the boost confirmation screen
* Morgulis now has a max buy button
* Various bugfixes

Hey Heroes! This update brings about balancing tweaks and a few other goodies!

* Some relics are more powerful as a result of this change
* Mercenaries have local notifications when they complete a quest or die
* Displays a tab notification when a mercenary completes a quest or dies
* Players can move all gilds to a hero on the boost confirmation screen
* Morgulis now has a max buy button
* Various bugfixes

Hey Heroes! Happy Easter!

* Fixed purchasing bugs for Samsung phones and Marshmallow devices
* If there are three or more gilded hero gifts pending, players can now open them all at once
* Reworked the interface for putting all gilds on one hero
* Various bug fixes

Hey Heroes! Happy Easter!

* If there are three or more gilded hero gifts pending, players can now open them all at once
* Reworked the interface for putting all gilds on one hero
* Various bug fixes

Welcome to Clicker Heroes 2.0 - The Transcendence Update

A series of inhuman sounds and vibrations that couldn’t possibly originate from any conceived living being are coming from your pocket. The Outsiders have awoken… And they’re coming to Clicker Heroes! Experience brand new gameplay, balancing, progression, and more in the biggest update to Clicker Heroes yet!

- Transcendence -
Take Ascension to the next level. Through the gifts granted by The Outsiders, reach higher levels of power than you could ever have imagined.

- Ancient Souls -
Feed The Outsiders souls, appease their insatiable appetite, and watch as they bestow ungodly powers upon you.

- Transcendent Power -
Every Primal Boss now drops exponentially more hero souls than its predecessor.

- Big Power, Big Numbers -
A reworked calculation system ensures that your newfound might is properly appreciated by the countless enemies you’ll be bashing to bits.

*Transcendence is unlocked after defeating Woodchip (the Rodent from level 300).

Five new heroes have risen to join the fight! Be sure to hire these new incredible beings and upgrade them. They are sure to increase your power to unseen heights!

Patch 2.0.9:

- Five new heroes!
- Fixes a bug that prevented some players from encountering primal bosses.
- Various other bug fixes.

As always, thanks for the support, and let us know what you think!

Introducing the all new Auto Clickers! Take a load off your fingers and optimize your progress with this awesome new feature. Get them now!

- New Feature: Auto Clickers
- Auto Clickers can be used to automatically level heroes, activate skills, and click monsters for you! Auto Clickers can be purchased in the shop for rubies.
- New Ancient: Nogardnit, Ancient of Moderation. Nogardnit provides increased gold gain per unassigned Auto Clicker when idle. This effect continues while the game is offline and benefits from Xyliqil.
- Fixes a number of text display issues related to DPS.
- Various bug fixes.

As always, thanks for the support, and let us know what you think!

Celebrate the Holidays with the "Merry CLICKMAS" event in Clicker Heroes!
New Features:
- Collect Presents for Rubies and Relics as well as special holiday items such as Auto Tapper skins, Candy Canes (which can be used to resurrect fallen mercenaries) and more.
- Seasonal Mercenary Quest: Mercenaries can be sent to retrieve Presents for you.
- New Seasonal Minigame: Present Panic! Tapping on a special clickable during the event brings you to a fight where you can tap rapidly to gather as many presents as you can.
- Get 50% bonus rubies on a $19.99 Rubies bundle – limited time only!
- Auto Tapper Skins!
- Adding support for Korean, Japanese, Traditional Chinese and Indonesian!

Celebrate the Holidays with the "Merry CLICKMAS" event in Clicker Heroes!
New Features:
- Collect Presents for Rubies and Relics as well as special holiday items such as Auto Tapper skins, Candy Canes (which can be used to resurrect fallen mercenaries) and more.
- Seasonal Mercenary Quest: Mercenaries can be sent to retrieve Presents for you.
- New Seasonal Minigame: Present Panic! Tapping on a special clickable during the event brings you to a fight where you can tap rapidly to gather as many presents as you can.
- Get 50% bonus rubies on a $19.99 Rubies bundle – limited time only!
- Auto Tapper Skins!
- Adding support for Korean, Japanese, Traditional Chinese and Indonesian!

2.3.0 ( 1.0e9 ) Patch Notes

- Saves can now be exported/imported through the Options menu. (Note: You will not be able to transfer between mobile and PC.)

- There is now a toggle on the Ancients panel that allows you to buy Ancient levels by value.

- Auto Tappers can now be placed on the Buy All Upgrades button.

- Adds the Boxy & Bloop Auto Tapper appearance which can be purchased for rubies.

- Adds the Random Auto Tapper appearance option which selects a randomly owned appearance whenever an Auto Tapper is placed.

- Patch notes can now be viewed through the Options menu.

- Various bugfixes

2.3.1 ( 1.0e9 ) Patch Notes

- IOS will now copy your save export correctly to clipboard.

- Patch notes can now be viewed through the Options menu.

- Various bugfixes

2.3.2 ( 1.0e9 ) Patch Notes

- Fixed issue with dropping auto clickers on Buy All Upgrades button for IOS.

2.3.1 ( 1.0e9 ) Patch Notes

- IOS will now copy your save export correctly to clipboard.

- Patch notes can now be viewed through the Options menu.

- Various bugfixes

- bug fixes
- minor performance improvements

Hey Heroes,

This is an early warning for patch 1.0e10. It will be arriving in several days, and will have a lot of changes!

If you’ve transcended ever, the game will require you to transcend upon loading into the 1.0e10 update!

- Significant balance changes
- Clickmas returns!

- Significant game rebalance
- Clickmas Returns!

- Significant game rebalance
- Clickmas Returns!

- Significant game rebalance
- Clickmas Returns!

Heroes:
* New Heroes!

Zone Scaling:
* Monsters per zone now increases by 0.1 every 500 zones (down from 1).
* Partial monsters per zone are counted as a chance of an additional monster.

Outsiders:
* Borb now grows at a rate of 12.5% per level (up from 10%).

Ancients:
* Kumawakamaru now approaches -8 monsters per zone (down from -100 monsters per zone).

Rubies:
* There is no longer a limit on the number of ruby tappables per ascension.
* Quick Ascension's hero soul reward will no longer grow past zone 1000000.
* Adds a 168 hour duration Timelapse purchasable for 50 rubies.
* Timelapse now has a minimum gold reward of an average monster farmed at highest zone this ascension.

Achievements:
* Adds achievements for acquiring 1000, 10000, and 100000 Ancient Souls.
* Adds achievements for beating zones 100000, 250000, and 1000000.

Mercenaries:
* Base rewards for gold quests now have a minimum reward of an average monster farmed at highest zone this ascension.

Skills:
* Tapstorm now provides a temporary +1 Auto Tapper (+2 when Energized) for its duration (changed from a flat +10 TPS).
* Activating a skill while idle will no longer break idle.
* Taps from Clickstorm will still break idle.
* Golden Taps will not benefit from idle gold since it requires taps which break idle.
* Energized skills now have a pink glow on the action bar.
* Activating a skill while it is still active will now extend the energized state in addition to resetting the duration.
* Skill durations longer than 60 seconds are now described in terms of minutes, hours, and days in the tooltip.
* Skill descriptions now list the time remaining on an active skill.

Miscellaneous:
* Adds a stat for Critical Tap Damage to the Stats Panel.
* Adds a stat for Auto Taps Per Second to the Stats Panel.
* Transcension Ancient Soul counts now also include the current ascension when showing AS to be gained from transcending.
* Adds an option to toggle the 'Entering Zone' text.
* Value leveling now supports a decimal place on the number's base (i.e. 1.1e10).
* Performance improvements have been made to Timelapse.
* General stability and performance improvements.

Bugfixes:
* Various bugfixes.
